headline: Duke Energy shares ways to save energy and money as temperatures plunge next week
summary: With frigid temperatures forecast to arrive early next week, Duke Energy is committed to helping customers save energy and money as heating systems work harder to combat the cold. By acting now, customers can take more control of their energy use – even as temperatures drop well below freezing.

headline: Can DUK's Massive Clean Energy Investments Drive Long-Term Growth?
summary: Duke Energy's hefty clean-energy and grid investments position the utility for rising electricity demand and long-term growth.

raw.headline: Can DUK's Massive Clean Energy Investments Drive Long-Term Growth?

headline: Duke Energy announces key leadership appointments
summary: Duke Energy (NYSE: DUK) today announced Cindy Lee, senior vice president, chief accounting officer and controller, will retire following 24 distinguished years with the company. Lee will step down from the role on March 1, 2026, and transition into a strategic advisor role until her retirement on Dec. 31.
